dict.acceptation: 企业；建立；（通常反对变革的）当权派；反对改革的保守当权派；

sent.orig: Tang opened the first year, Fuzhou on the establishment of the College of Science Temple.
sent.trans: 唐开元年间，福州就设立书院庙学。

sent.orig: The political establishment is even more firmly behind Israel than the public is.
sent.trans: 而民意背后的政治基础比公众基础更为稳固。

sent.orig: Congress shall make no law establishment of religion, or prohibiting the free exercise exercise thereof.
sent.trans: 国会既不能在法律上给宗教地位，也不能禁止有关宗教的自由活动。
非教学人员组（铨叙事项）

sent.orig: Economic background of marketplace pattern and effective establishment of the stock market are two prerequisites inarticle.
sent.trans: 本文默认了市场模式的经济背景和股票市场的有效确立的研究前提。
